item.title: Value vs Reference: Deep vs Shallow
item.description: A short tutorial on object copying in JS and the distinction between a shallow and deep copies, and values and references.

item.title: Draw Photo Histograms: D3 + Canvas
item.description: Exploring histograms using vanilla JavaScript, D3, and the FileReader API.

item.title: Histograms in D3 and Observable HQ
item.description: An introduction to creating histograms in D3 and the use of Observable HQ to make interactive notebooks for data exploration.

item.title: Prototypal Inheritance Basics
item.description: What are prototypes and what does prototypal inheritance mean in JavaScript? Covers the new keyword, Object.create, and ES5 class syntax.

item.title: Scope & Closures: let vs var in JavaScript
item.description: Closures allow a function to retain information about its context after the function has returned. We provide examples and cases where closures can be useful.
